subject: refactor(markdown-parser): rename ParsedLink.label to ParsedLink.title
body:
Eliminates "label" ambiguity â€” previously used for both `labels[]`
(categorization array) and relationship names on links. Now `label`
means exactly one thing: the `labels[]` categorization array. Link
relationship names use `title`, matching the Arc data model field
they map to during resolution.

Also renames constants ARC_LABEL_CONTAINS/ARC_LABEL_LINKS_TO to
ARC_TITLE_CONTAINS/ARC_TITLE_LINKS_TO for consistency.

Tags: terminology, markdown-parser, consistency
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: terminology-consistency
Semver: patch

title: rename ParsedLink.label to ParsedLink.title
